These are the available GM commands in game. Base Commands: //admin - Brings up the admin menu. //gmchat - Sends a global message that only GMs can see. Usage - //gmchat Type message here //gm - Turns on or off your GM status. //invul - Makes you invulnerable. //invis - Makes you invisible. //delete - Used to remove a targetted Mob. Mob will not respawn. //kill - Used to kill a targetted Mob. Mob will respawn. //res - Resurrect target. //heal - Restore target HP CP MP. //tele - Quick move NWSE menu. //spawn - Spawns a Mob on current target. Usage - //spawn npc_id //show_spawns - Opens spawn menu. //create_item - Creates an item. Usage - //create_item item_id //give_item - Creates an item to target(Any char). Usage - //give_item item_id //itemcreate - Opens the item creation menu.
